channel.title: course on Gergő Vári's blog
channel.description: Recent content in course on Gergő Vári's blog

item.title: ...here are the answers for YOUR questions.
item.content:encoded:
As you may remember I’ve ran a campaign for a free course: clearly my target audience was borked, I couldn’t properly find my advertisement platforms… I’ve not gotten enough interest nor questions for a whole course…

…but, I’ve got enough quality questions to warrant an answer. So here you can access all my thoughts as soon as I finish writing all of them.

This was a pretty big learning journey: I even had to contact a few already more successful influencers.

Don’t be shy: join us and see the answers.
